title: "Tiramisu <br> 提拉米苏"

### 🥣 Ingredients | 用料

| Ingredient | 用料 | Amount | 份量 |
|------------|------|--------|------|
| Egg yolk | 蛋黄 | 1 | 一个 |
| Sugar | 白砂糖 | 25 g | 25克 |
| Water | 水 | 6 g | 6克 |
| Gelatin powder | 吉利丁 | 5 g | 5克 |
| Mascarpone cheese | 马斯卡彭 | 120 g | 120克 |
| Whipping cream | 淡奶油 | 160 g | 160克 |
| Cocoa powder | 可可粉 | As needed | 适量 |
| Ladyfingers | 手指饼干 | As needed | 适量 |

### 🍴 Steps | 步骤
1. In a bowl over hot water, whisk egg yolk, sugar, and water until pale and thick.  
 容器中加入蛋黄、白砂糖和水，隔热水搅拌至发白膨胀。
2. Add gelatin and mix until fully dissolved.  
 加入吉利丁粉，搅拌均匀。
3. Remove from heat and mix in mascarpone until smooth.  
 从热水中拿出后加入马斯卡彭，搅拌均匀。
4. Whip cream until thick, then fold into the mascarpone mixture.  
 淡奶油打发至浓稠状态后，加入容器中搅拌均匀。
5. Pour half of the mixture into a container, layer with ladyfingers, then top with the remaining mixture.  
 倒入一半液体，铺上一层手指饼干，再倒入剩下的液体。
6. Dust the top with cocoa powder.  
 表面撒上一层可可粉。
7. Chill in refrigerator for 2 hours before serving.  
 冰箱冷藏2小时后即可享用。
